text: To qualify, communities applying had to define the conservancy’s boundary, elect a representedrepresentingreproductiverepresentativerepresentativeconservancy committee, negotiate a legal constitution, prove the committee’s ability tominglemanagemantlemanagementmanagefunds, and produce an acceptable plan forequitableinequitableequalityinequalityequitabledistribution of wildlife-related benefits (Long 2004:33). Once approved, registered conservancies acquire the wrightsrightswriteopportunitiesrightsto a sustainable wildlife quota set by the ministry. The animals can either be sold to trophy hunting companies or hunted and consumed by the community. As legal entities, conservancies can also enter into contracts with private-sector tourism operators.
